::Battera::

She looked at CyberShark and then yawned. She ws tired and she knew 
it.  She smiled and put her hand on his shoulder. "You know, I've 
been wondering, why did you come out here? You were safe back at the 
base. Why'd you follow me out here? I don't  get it. And another 
thing I don't get. Why does this bot feel so strongly about his past? 
I mean, I know the past, but it's like I read it in a history log.  
It's there, but I don't feel anything for it." She had other 
questions reeling around in her mind, but she wasnted these few 
questions answered first.  She turned her head and looked at 
Vulois, "And why do I even give a care about him." She then looked at 
CyberShark and looked into his eyes. "And why do I care for you so 
much. Why?"  She looked at him, hoping for some answers.
